name: Lonicera xylosteum
Relationship: Compare: LONICERA PERICYLMENUM - Honeysuckle - (irritability of temper, with violent outburst (CROCUS.)

Head: Contraction of one pupil and dilatation of the other
Congestion of head and chest; coma
Sopor, eyes half open, red face
Extremities: Limbs and head fall over as if paralyzed

details: Convulsive symptoms. Uraemic convulsions. Albuminuria. Syphilis.
